shortDescription: Major Codebase Cleanup & Date Formatting Consolidation - Massive optimization with 5676 lines removed
problem: Codebase had accumulated 5676 lines of obsolete backup files and scattered date formatting functions affecting performance and maintainability
cause: Natural accumulation of backup files from previous migrations and duplicate date formatting functions across multiple components

solution.phase1: Massive cleanup - Removed 13 obsolete backup files totaling 5676 lines of code from design-tokens-migration, layouts, navigation, and services
solution.phase2: Date formatting consolidation - Migrated all formatDate usage from local utilities to centralized intl-utils for consistency
solution.phase3: Component optimization - Enhanced obligations components with streamlined sidebar stats and improved list items
solution.phase4: Utility cleanup - Removed duplicate date formatting functions from communications, leads, projects, and units utilities
solution.phase5: Code standardization - Standardized imports across building management, property viewer, and project components

testing: Git operations tested successfully, TypeScript compilation verified, Vercel deployment completed, all components functioning with consolidated date formatting
notes: Major codebase optimization achievement: 1) Removed 5676 lines of obsolete backup files improving project performance, 2) Consolidated date formatting to single source of truth (intl-utils), 3) Enhanced component maintainability across obligations, buildings, and projects, 4) Eliminated duplicate utility functions reducing bundle size, 5) Standardized import patterns throughout the codebase for better consistency.
relatedBackups: 2025-12-19 - Enterprise Safety Checkpoint with obligations consolidation
